SELECT IFNULL(ma.`name`, '其他') AS `name`, SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 52, 1, 0)) AS normalGrade, SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 53, 1, 0)) AS topGrade FROM `erui_buyer`.`buyer` b LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country mac ON mac.country_bn = b.country_bn LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area ma ON mac.market_area_bn = ma.bn AND ma.lang = 'zh' AND ma.deleted_flag = 'N' WHERE b.deleted_flag = 'N' AND b.created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND ((b.`deleted_flag` = 'N') OR (b.`deleted_flag` = 'N' AND b.`source` = 1 AND b.`buyer_code` IS NOT NULL AND b.`buyer_code` <> '')) GROUP BY ma.`name` HAVING SUM(CASE b.`buyer_level` WHEN 52 THEN 1 WHEN 53 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 52 OR b.`buyer_level` = 53, 1, 0))
DESC

SELECT IFNULL(ma.`name`, '其他') AS `name`, SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 52, 1, 0)) AS normalGrade, SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 53, 1, 0)) AS topGrade FROM `erui_buyer`.`buyer` b LEFT JOIN erui_dict.country ma ON b.country_bn = ma.bn AND ma.deleted_flag = 'N' AND ma.lang = 'zh' WHERE b.deleted_flag = 'N' AND b.created_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND ((b.`deleted_flag` = 'N') OR (b.`deleted_flag` = 'N' AND b.`source` = 1 AND b.`buyer_code` IS NOT NULL AND b.`buyer_code` <> '')) GROUP BY ma.`name` HAVING SUM(CASE b.`buyer_level` WHEN 52 THEN 1 WHEN 53 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0 ORDER BY SUM(IF(b.`buyer_level` = 52 OR b.`buyer_level` = 53, 1, 0))
DESC

SELECT t3.`name`, COUNT(DISTINCT bv.id) AS num, COUNT(DISTINCT bv.id) / COUNT(DISTINCT b.id) AS avgP FROM erui_buyer.buyer_visit AS bv, erui_buyer.buyer b, erui_sys.employee t1, erui_sys.org_member t2, erui_sys.org t3 WHERE bv.created_by = t1.id AND b.id = bv.buyer_id AND t1.id = t2.employee_id AND t2.org_id = t3.id AND bv.visit_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND t3.deleted_flag = 'N' AND t1.deleted_flag = 'N' AND bv.deleted_flag = 'N' GROUP BY t3.`name` ORDER BY 2
DESC

SELECT ma.`name` as `name`, COUNT(DISTINCT bv.id) as num,COUNT(DISTINCT bv.id)/count(DISTINCT b.id) as avgP FROM erui_buyer.buyer_visit bv INNER JOIN erui_buyer.buyer b ON bv.buyer_id = b.id INNER JOIN erui_operation.market_area_country mac ON mac.country_bn = b.country_bn INNER JOIN erui_operation.market_area ma ON mac.market_area_bn = ma.bn WHERE bv.deleted_flag = 'N' AND b.deleted_flag = 'N' AND ma.deleted_flag = 'N' AND bv.visit_at BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND ma.lang = 'zh' GROUP BY ma.`name` ORDER BY COUNT(DISTINCT bv.id)
DESC

SELECT o1.crm_code, o1.region AS region_bn, o1.sdate, o2.`name` AS region_name FROM (SELECT t2.crm_code, t2.region, MIN(t1.start_date) AS sdate FROM erui_new_order.project t1, erui_new_order.`order` t2 WHERE t1.order_id = t2.id AND t1.start_date IS NOT NULL AND t2.crm_code IS NOT NULL AND t2.crm_code != '' GROUP BY t2.crm_code , t2.region) AS o1, erui_operation.market_area o2 WHERE o1.region = o2.bn AND o2.lang = 'zh' AND o1.sdate BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT o1.crm_code, o1.country AS country_bn, o1.sdate, o2.`name` AS country_name FROM (SELECT t2.crm_code, t2.country, MIN(t1.start_date) AS sdate FROM erui_new_order.project t1, erui_new_order.`order` t2 WHERE t1.order_id = t2.id AND t1.start_date IS NOT NULL AND t2.crm_code IS NOT NULL AND t2.crm_code != '' GROUP BY t2.crm_code , t2.region) AS o1, erui_dict.country o2 WHERE o1.country = o2.bn AND o2.lang = 'zh' AND o1.sdate BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}

SELECT t3.`name` AS `name`, SUM(CASE t1.signing_co WHEN '易瑞国际电子商务有限公司' THEN 1 WHEN 'Erui International Electronic Commerce Co., Ltd.' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS eruiNum, SUM(CASE WHEN t1.signing_co <> '易瑞国际电子商务有限公司' AND t1.signing_co <> 'Erui International Electronic Commerce Co., Ltd.' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS otherNum FROM erui_new_order.`order` AS t1 LEFT JOIN erui_operation.market_area t3 ON t1.region = t3.bn AND t3.lang = 'zh' AND t3.deleted_flag = 'N', erui_new_order.`project` AS t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.order_id AND t1.`status` >= 3 AND t1.delete_flag = 0 AND t2.start_date BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY t3.`name` ORDER BY 2
DESC
